review: Bought Amazon Fire TV and a Roku 3. This was my first experiences with any streaming player so I wanted to compare. The Roku 3 streamed like a breeze with ZERO buffer on Amazon Prime, Netflix, and HuluPlus -- just flawless.I disconnected the Roku 3 and plugged in the the Amazon Fire TV -- it looked slick as did the menus so I set up my accounts. I tested an Amazon Prime movie -- sold, smooth, no buffer, full HD. Tested Netflix, horrible -- stopped, buffered, and locked up. Tested HuluPlus and the exact same thing, but the audio would play and the screen would lock up. I unplugged the power on Amazon Fire TV, plugged it back in and restarted it. Same thing happened -- tons of buffering and locking up on Netflix and HuluPlus. Immediately boxed up Amazon Fire TV for return and bought another Roku 3 and couldn't be happier.
author: Brandon E.

review: Easy to set up and voice search,  works as expected.  I am one step down from fastest internet speed available and no problems with streaming.  I would highly recommend having a computer or Kindle to navigate through movies and programs and place them in watch list as opposed to hunting on the Fire itself.  I have not tried the gaming yet and will need to get a controller if I want to.  The controller seems a little over priced so it will not be soon.  Overall I am recommending this to my friends and have had a steady stream of them in to check it out.  A great entertainment addition!
